title: Do Not Want Epic Skin
body: I'd like to please return the Steel Legion Garen skin I got for purchasing a rune page and refund my RP. I don't play Garen and I don't want to. I'd rather have my RP back to get something I actually want. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Chermorg is absolutely correct! The Rune Pages you bought are still in your inventory, but you can [ticket us ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)if you want that Garen removed from your inventory.
You still have access to the rune pages you purchased, the skin is just an added "thanks for your support a long time ago" thing.
